GlobalLookupField.Title: New Product & Process Development
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
• New formulation and/or new process for lead concept
  • 18 months to 2 years

GlobalLookupField.Title: Line Extension
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
• Updated formulation on existing product form
  • 9 months to 1.5 years

GlobalLookupField.Title: Downweight/Transitions
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
• No formula change, potential pack change
  • 5 months to 1 year

GlobalLookupField.Title: Simple Network Move
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
• NO CHANGES are needed in packaging, graphics
  • NO CHANGES to materials or suppliers

GlobalLookupField.Title: New Pack Type
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
• Updated Packaging on existing product
  • 9 months to 2 years

GlobalLookupField.Title: Renovation & Quality Improvement
GlobalLookupField.ProjectDescription:
• Updated formulation for minor adjustments due to supply
  • 9 months to 1.5 years
